class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        
        n = len(points)
        arr1 = [0 for i in range(n)]
        arr2 = [0 for i in range(n)]

        for i in range(n):
            arr1[i] = (points[i][0] + points[i][1], i)
            arr2[i] = (points[i][0] - points[i][1], i)

        # Sorting both the vectors
        arr1.sort()
        arr2.sort()
        ans = math.inf
        for i in range(n):
            j = 0
            k = n-1
            if arr1[0][1] == i: j = 1
            if arr1[-1][1] == i: k -=1
            a = arr1[k][0] - arr1[j][0]
            j = 0
            k = n-1
            if arr2[0][1] == i: j = 1
            if arr2[-1][1] == i: k -=1
            b = arr2[k][0] - arr2[j][0]
            ans = min(ans, max(a, b))
        return ans
